how_to_step_four: Click ‘Save and Download’ to download your rotated PDF.
how_to_step_three: Add more files or rotate and delete pages, if needed.
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF file(s) into the tool.
how_to_step_two: Select and drag and drop the pages to rearrange them in the desired order.
how_to_title: How to Organize PDF File Online for Free
feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to organize PDF pages.
feature_four_text: Working with Organize PDF Pages is absolutely secure. The entire process of organizing PDF pages happens on the client side (directly in your browser), no third parties can access your data.
feature_one_text: You can use this Organize PDF pages tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to organize PDF files.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the organize PDF pages online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: This tool enables you to organize, rotate and delete PDF pages, giving you complete control over the final document before saving it.
feature_two_text: Thanks to its powerful processing capabilities, this tool is able to organize multiple PDF files in a shorter amount of time.
page_header_text: Organize PDF pages online for free. You can select one or multiple pages and organize them at once!
